bond.title: Stella Donnelly on the painful friend breakup that inspired her new album: ‘I’m trying to protect them – but I’ve written this record’
bond.description:
On her third album, Love and Fortune, the Australian singer has captured the dull ache of being rejected by a friend – and how she fell in love with music again

  • Get our weekend culture and lifestyle email

Stella Donnelly didn’t want to write songs about a friend who broke her heart. But any time the Welsh Australian singer-songwriter tried to channel anything else into her lyrics, the hurt was always there on the surface.

We have a language for coping with romantic heartbreak, learned from movies and songs – but there are fewer mirrors in art for coping with the end of platonic bonds. On her third album, Love and Fortune, Donnelly has captured the dull ache of being rejected by a friend who once knew her best of all. It might become the record ghosted friends turn to when they find a person they knew intimately for years no longer wants to hear from them.

inflation.title: The Guardian view on Argentina’s election: one step closer to becoming a Trumpian client state | Ediorial
inflation.description:
A $40bn rescue may have helped Javier Milei scrape through midterms, but it leaves Argentina’s democracy and economy more dependent than ever on Washington

Argentina’s rightwing president, Javier Milei, his party and its allies claimed victory this week in key congressional elections. But it was Donald Trump who emerged the biggest winner. A $40bn lifeline from the US president gave Mr Milei’s beleaguered government just enough credibility – and apparent firepower – to halt the Argentinian peso’s slide. Crucially, this helped to stabilise consumer prices in the final weeks of the campaign. The US rescue engendered a short-lived aura of competence that allowed Mr Milei to shift the blame for rising prices back to the opposition, despite his own role in accelerating inflation by devaluing the currency when he took office.

Mr Milei’s wasn’t a decisive triumph. His rightwing coalition got 40% of the midterms vote thanks largely to a low turnout and a fragmented opposition. His “chainsaw” programme of privatisation and public spending cuts has not been popular. Polls suggest that six in 10 voters disapprove. Unsurprising, perhaps: since Mr Milei took office in December 2023, Argentinians’ purchasing power has fallen sharply, real wages have declined and more than 200,000 jobs have been lost.

inflation.title: A single match cost me thousands of dollars at 2026’s World Cup of the 1% | Leander Schaerlaeckens
inflation.description:
With ticket sales phases under way and prices reaching eye-watering levels, my experience raised a crucial question: who is this World Cup for?

For months, people in my life had been asking me when and where to get World Cup tickets. In the absence of any actionable information from Fifa before the first round of the pre-sale opened up, they hoped, I guess, that I had inside knowledge.

In truth, I only knew that Fifa would be using the universally despised dynamic pricing model, and that the bid book for the 2026 World Cup had promised an average group stage ticket price of $305. Mind you, that was seven and a half years ago and an awful lot of inflation has happened since then. In the bid, Category 4 tickets for the group stage – the cheapest seats available – were priced at $21. (As we would soon learn, the actual price would start at $60, and category 4 tickets are almost non-existent.)

central bank.description: Central bank says labour market is ‘robust’ and private balance sheets are ‘solid’

summary:
今日全球科技与经济领域呈现出“冰火两重天”的复杂图景。一方面，人工智能浪潮继续以惊人速度重塑产业格局：英伟达成为全球首家市值突破5万亿美元的企业，印证了资本市场对AI算力的狂热追捧；与此同时，Meta宣布将AI年度支出提升至超700亿美元，与微软、谷歌共同形成“三巨头百亿级投入”的竞争态势。然而这种狂热背后已显现隐忧——奥特曼放弃OpenAI股权的架构调整引发对AI商业模式的深层思考，黄仁勋虽带领英伟达登顶却面临“AI算力皇帝新衣”的质疑，微软Azure云服务故障更暴露出AI基础设施的脆弱性。

在地缘政治层面，中美博弈出现新动向。特朗普与习近平会晤后宣布降低部分关税及稀土合作，但未达成正式贸易协议；与此同时，美国国防部获令加速核试验以追赶中俄， Volkswagen因芯片短缺预警15亿美元亏损，凸显科技竞争已延伸至战略资源领域。企业层面呈现“突围与困局”并存的景象：中国科技企业通过差异化创新寻找出路，杉海创新推出AI超分子智造平台，源天生物以酶法再生PET技术获丰田战略投资；但另一方面，上海老牌烘焙连锁破产清算，京东陷入“二选一”争议，岚图汽车“带血”赴港IPO，折射出传统行业面临的转型阵痛。

特别值得关注的是，AI应用正面临伦理与监管的十字路口：Character.AI禁止18岁以下用户使用其聊天机器人，Adobe推出可修改语音情绪的“矫正AI”引发伦理争议，当骗子开始利用AI技术行骗时，技术进步与社会适应力之间的鸿沟日益凸显。从飞书获得ISO 42001认证到蚂蚁国际投资拉美信贷平台，中国企业的全球化合规运营正在进入新阶段，而RISC-V架构商业化跑通、印度信实工业与谷歌合作提供免费AI服务等事件，则预示着全球科技格局正在经历新一轮重构。在这个技术爆炸与地缘震荡并存的时代，如何平衡创新激情与现实约束，将成为所有参与者必须面对的永恒命题。
